price: 26. Markaasuu u laabtay dhinac xagga reerkiisii oo keenay dibi buuran oo shiilan.
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجۡلٖ سَمِينٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ahlihi fajāa biʿij'lin samīnin
